overview:
Philippe Clover, the legend behind the equipment rental industry across American and European subcontinent comes with a wealthy experience of over more than 29 years. He is a Master in Business Administration, from University of Paris IX Dauphine and University of Caen. He now heads the Quippo Construction Equipment Ltd. as the President.

Achievements

* Accelerated a profitable expansion of HERC in France and Spain Carried out successful negotiations leading to operations across Europe
* Incorporated best practices for operational excellence and profitability in CATERPILLAR Inc. Peoria U.S.A.
